formElement.label: Virtual Machine Name:
formElement.documentation: Provide the name of the virtual machine to delete.

formElement.label: Number of Virtual Machines:
formElement.documentation: Indicate the number of virtual machines to delete. The default is 1. If the value is greater than 1, a suffix is added to VM names. The suffix consists of an underscore and the VM number ('_#').

formElement.label: Time Out:
formElement.documentation: Specify the step execution timeout length in minutes. Leave blank for no timeout.
